mapper.select: select * from userInfo where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update addressInfo set name=#{address.name}, phoneNumber=#{address.phoneNumber}, province=#{address.province}, city=#{address.city}, county=#{address.county}, village=#{address.village}, detailedAddress=#{address.detailedAddress} where userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select exists (select 1 from userInfo where username=#{username}) -- 感谢来自StackOverflow的指导，SQL语句中的 select 1 form 里的 1 是因为事实上这个地方只需要检验存在性，不需要任何属性。或许可以提升性能？ -- 谁知道呢
mapper.insert: insert into userInfo (username, password, nickname, phoneNumber) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phoneNumber}) -- 事实证明这里并不需要动态SQL
